mapper.update: update AreaInfo set AreaName = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fatherCode = #{fathercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "level" = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrbute1 = #{attrbute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrbute2 = #{attrbute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrbute3 = #{attrbute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrbute4 = #{attrbute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attrbute5 = #{attrbute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AreaCode, AreaName, fatherCode, "level", attrbute1, attrbute2, attrbute3, attrbute4, attrbute5 from AreaInfo where AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select AreaCode, AreaName, fatherCode, "level", attrbute1, attrbute2, attrbute3, attrbute4, attrbute5 from AreaInfo
